name: androidpublisher_edits_testers_update
description: Updates testers. Note: Testers resource does not support email lists.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

Testers.description: The testers of an app. The resource for TestersService. Note: while it is possible in the Play Console UI to add testers via email lists, email lists are not supported by this resource.

googleGroups.description: All testing Google Groups, as email addresses.

$block: The testers of an app. The resource for TestersService. Note: while it is possible in the Play Console UI to add testers via email lists, email lists are not supported by this resource.

$ul: **googleGroups**: All testing Google Groups, as email addresses.
